title: Bobby Marks on Jrue Holiday trade rumors and Golden State's plans with the #2 pick
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Bobby Marks about the NBA start date for 2020-21, Jrue Holiday trade rumors, what Golden State might do with the No. 2 pick, and more.
